overview: Hellboy, his pyrokinetic girlfriend, Liz, and aquatic empath, Abe Sapien, face their biggest battle when an underworld elven prince plans to reclaim Earth for his magical kindred. Tired of living in the shadow of humans, Prince Nuada tries to awaken anÂ ancient force of killing machines, the all-powerful Golden Army, to clear the way for fantasy creatures to roam free. Only Hellboy can stop the dark prince and prevent humanity's annihilation.
tagline: Believe it or not... He's the good guy.
title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army

cast.name: Brian Steele
cast.character: Wink / Cronie / Spice Shop Troll / Cathedral Head / Fragglewump
